message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you be interested in exploring this opportunity further? Considering its unique features, I kindly propose an offer of $120 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $80-$100. I would like to make a counteroffer at $95.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am glad we're able to find common ground. Based on our discussion, I would like to make a counteroffer at $98. This price reflects the value we place on the product while remaining within your budget considerations.
